price: Onipa, εdeεn adeε paa na adaadaa wo wͻ wo Wura Adom Hene no ho?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
